org.gbif.occurrencestore.download.oozie

Class ArchiveBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrencestore.download.oozie.ArchiveBuilder

  • public class ArchiveBuilder
extends Object
    Creates a dwc archive for occurrence downloads based on the hive query result files generated during the Oozie workflow. It create a local archive folder with an occurrence data file and a dataset subfolder that contains an EML metadata file per dataset involved.

    • Method Summary

      Main method to assemble the dwc archive and do all the work until we have a final zip file.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException
        Entry point for assembling the dwc archive. The thrown exception is the only way of telling Oozie that this job has failed.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any read/write operation failed
